website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to cooling pain relief, this gel ice pack is on par with most others. However, durability concerns make it better suited for injuries rather than chronic inflammatory conditions.
pros: Non-irritating nylon shell paired with a nontoxic silica gel filling is safe for all ages
Remains pliable when frozen, delivering contouring pain relief
Conveniently available in a wide variety of sizes
cons: Multiple users experienced issues with split seams and leaking

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: The seam broke after about three weeks of use and squirted its contents all over my chair. I threw it away when I probably should've kept it and returned it, but it was such a sloppy mess, I ditched it. So now I have no ice pack and a ruined chair. I have another one that I purchased locally at a rip off medical supply story (they charged me $52!), and it's model "S13." It has held up for months--however, I purchased another S13 from the same rip-off store and THAT one busted in two weeks. All in all, I'd say stay away from these--you have no guarantee they'll hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Rotten warranty policy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these cold packs and while they work really well for awhile, two of them have simply split at the seams for no reason. I use them for back pain; they are laid flat in my freezer with nothing on top of them, and placed behind my back with a towel around them in a while I am sitting in a soft chair. The first one that split was over a year old, but this time it is under a year. The rerun policy stated that I only had a month for return or replacement. Bogus!!!!! I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. DeSmet

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just had ACL Replacement surgery, so I thought I'd try these ice packs out. They're absolutely terrible. They leak a foul smelling liquid and it's very disgusting. This was a waste of my money and I will be returning. Just don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Freeze your injuries right off with these babies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found these! I played college sports and had a trainer that sent us to the ice whirlpool when we had minor-moderate injuries. So I like my cold therapy VERY cold. I bought 2 of these to ice my foot after PT (recovering from foot surgery) and these babies are COLD! I always feel amazing after using them. Don't take this as gospel, because body/skin types vary, but they don't get so cold that you have to worry about ice burn or frostbite. I mistakenly/stupidly left one on for 40 min once w/ direct skin contact and didn't get ice burn.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Upside - Nice and cold, large area of coverage. Downside - while using mine for just over a month, one of the seams burst open and the gooey, sticky slime inside got all over my clothes, furniture, and carpet (and even on my dog - while I was hurrying to get to a sink). I got no response from the seller when I reached out to them. So that, plus the fact that I'm out $$ for a product that barely lasted a month is why I am giving only two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this cold pack the handful of times I used it, but it split at the seams after owning for less than four months. When the seam splits open, it starts leaking a brown/green substance. I currently have the ice pack sealed in a huge ziploc bag so the GOP doesn't get everywhere, but this requires me to have the ice pack folded in half so I can't use it fully. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: philosophress

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality & Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the X-Large size Colpac, and it busted open at the seam not long after using it. Unfortunately it was just past the return/refund date, so I could not get a refund. This is very poor quality as it did not last long at all!!! This busted at the seam even while taking good care of it. Do not buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Creative Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! - NOT - THESE ARE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Updated 8/18/2020 I ordered 4 of these in 2 separate orders. I already had to request a refund for 2 of them due to them leaking gray goo. Now the second 2 are doing the are doing the same thing, and it's too late to return them. FIND SOMETHING ELSE! Not worth $25 each!! revised rating - these are NOT GOOD!!! After a few weeks of constant use both of them have developed holes in the seams and are leaking whatever substance is inside them. VERY DISAPPOINTED for something that was $25 each! Perfect for icing my husband's knee after knee replacement surgery. Stays cold for a good while, and re-freezes quickly.
customer_reviews.author: miac888

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I never got one of these before.  Save the environment.
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday after PT on my ankle. Why didn't I buy this before? This is the largest I could find. It wraps my ankle plus. A little overkill for just my ankle. But I plan to use it for other larger needs. I can't believe I didn't get one of these before. I have used so many zipper type plastic bags and ice. I use it with an old pillow case to protect my body from freeze. Also recommend wiping down the pack with pillow case before putting back in the freezer to keep from icing up the pack and also adding frost to your freezer.
customer_reviews.author: FranciscoTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Heat welded seam leaking.
customer_reviews.text: Update 8/21; I contacted Colpac with the help of Amazon, and they are sending me a replacement. I purchased the half size in February 2020 to replace the one I've had for over 10 YEARS. 6 months later the new one is leaking from the seam in 2 places. I see that others are having the same problem. Is it asking too much for a company to keep up the quality that they were previously known for? I'm not sure how to get this replaced under warranty, but will contact Amazon. All that being said, I really do like how these conform to the shape of your body and that they stay cold for 20 - 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I use these gel packs for chronic pain from lupus and arthritis. I sent some to my granddaughter for severe pain in her knees. They are perfect for neck stiffness, neuropathy, & the inflammation that lupus brings during a flare. I put the small one between my palms when the heat from inflammation keeps me awake, on my elbows for bursitis pain, my knees for osteoarthritis, hips for bursitis, from the freezer, used until they're ready to pop back in & re-freeze which only takes about 30 minutes. I don't take prescription pain med, only Tylenol, because this is the safer long-term option for me.
customer_reviews.author: snowflake2007

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, I noticed it was heavy when it came out of the freezer. The size was too big, and I tried to return, but was told the item was not returnable due to health standards. If used with a pillow case, the cold holds well. The bummer is that I've only used it for two months and it's leaking already. When I asked my physical therapist about this, he said the black colored ColPac's usually last longer. Needless to say, I"m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Ice Packs, But Be Warned...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these packs, so much that I bought 6 of them. But, I really thought they would last longer than 18 months. Granted only one has busted at the seam so far, but it was my favorite one. This yucky poop looking stuff was squeezing out of the seam. I thought I bought the good ones but now I'm worried the others will have the same fate.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Huff

customer_reviews.title: Leaking not the product it used to be 😭
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as many all of the sudden mud looking goo leaking from seem. Actually got all over my carpet and it took a while for me to figure out it was my cold pac. Is their no warranty here? Had mine for just 6 months and have a bigger size too. This was my favorite. Even though something is clearly wrong its far superior to any other I have found. Maybe thats why the cost is so low this brand used to be 5x the current amount. If theirs a toll free number to call & send this back and get a new one i will modify my review.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. (I saw some people were complaining about it dripping water, it's an ice pack folks. If you put it in the freezer with condensation on it, the condensation freezes, so when you take it out again it melts - hence the water. It's called science.) This pack is nice and thick and a good size for upper back or lower back. (If you want both, I suggest you go with the larger pack which I also purchased.) It's holds it freeze longer than other packs and is well made. I've used it several times already and don't know how I went without it before.
customer_reviews.author: QueenEvil

customer_reviews.title: seam split after a year of gentle use
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 2 star because after only a year of light use one of the seams split. Ever see what is inside of one of these? Looks like brownish grey snot, ashes, and gravy mixed. Yum! At any rate, i used it on my neck to chill out my cervical vertibrae and it worked. It helped me a lot. Until it broke. I wear a 17 or 16.5 shirt collar and this fit with some to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Biggins

customer_reviews.title: STARTED LEAKING AFTER 2 USES IN FREEZER ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even heat this in microwave, only stored in freezer for a month and when used second time the goop was leaking out of the seal. Maybe I just got a bad one but wouldn't buy again. I didn't find this out until I was out of return window so total loss for me. Do not buy unless you plan on using right away or else check seals when then arrive I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Shop till you drop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and high quality product at a low cost!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Purchased after using the same one during physical therapy. I expected it to cost much more. I’m so glad it was so inexpensive! Gel filled so it doesn’t become hard. Very easy to form/mold to whatever shape needed. I used it to wrap around my elbow. My wife has used it on her back. I recommend using a pillow case as this will allow the cold to transfer much better than a towel. I felt nothing after 20 minutes with a towel. Skin was still warm. If you want a deep cool, use a pillow case. You can always add a towel if it it too cold!
customer_reviews.author: D. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great for after shoulder surgery!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for after my shoulder surgery to use in place of the ice machine that insurance doesn't cover. They work perfectly and I'm not attached to a machine so I can still move about freely. I tuck one side under the sling strap that goes across my back if I'm up moving around. I bought 2 but in hindsight it would've been nice to have 3 because I sometimes forget to put the one I sleep with back in the freezer when I wake up. I've been using these for 2 months and they've held up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Use to be more durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had ice packs from this company for years, but this one and others my house has gotten this year has been very disappointing. I threw out 3 yesterday with multiple holes in each. They are not kept with shape objects or squashed. I use ice packs on a daily basis to help with arthritis, so i am going to try the black packs before i move on to another maker. I hope i have better luck with them. I will say, the old ones i had lasted me for years. these are a wonderful thing to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: wsm

customer_reviews.title: Please contact me with a working email.
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping this review catches the company's attention. The cold pack is wonderful until the seams rip open and the brown mud like substance leaks out everywhere! I emailed the company using the email I acquired from Amazon... but the email would not go through. The cold pack wasn't used much and isn't even a year old... I'd like to know if there's a warranty? If someone could get back to me that would completely change my review to a much better one.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knee and back
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack is perfect for knee and back injuries. Flexible enough to surround area, but durable enough not to split easy. I have purchased many of these over the years. Not due to defect, but due to lending them out and giving them to people too. Everyone falls in love with these. Don't lend them out unless you are prepared to give them away. Honestly.
customer_reviews.author: ksk

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and when I opened it the instructions was wet on the inside. I took the pak out and liquid was seeping out in several places. No wonder they have a no refund or return policy. This makes me very upset. I would suggest never buying products that can't be refunded or returned. I would never buy this product again if it did come with a return/refund. It's obviously very cheap to say the least. I guess I got what I paid for. I will continue buying big bags of ice, at least when it leaks its not foreign substances all over me. If I could it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Preventing Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my forehead and temples, moving it around every couple of minutes to prevent tension headaches. (Not over my eyes, it kinda hurts my eyelids to have something so cold on them) I was getting strong headaches several times a week before I bought this and now they are rare. Works great. After 10 minutes, I put it back in the freezer and feel much more relaxed and eye and temple muscles are no longer strained. Might also prevent wrinkles because you’re not furrowing your brows anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Loza

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks after two months - multiple purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have purchased multiple sizes of these kinds of ice packs only to have them leak all over my bed or clothing. You would think the product would last longer than 2 months. I'm never buying this brand again. Photo shows what I woke up to this morning. The gray marks are from the liquid inside the pack. I didn't lie on it. I had it on top of my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing. comfortable and always ready!
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping this in my freezer so it is ready to use. It doesn't take up much room and is worth having available. I used to use a hard ice pack like what you might use in a cooler. Those deliver cold but they are not comfortable. I first used this gel ColPac at physical therapy and was amazed at how comfortable it was, which is why I decided to order one for myself. What a relief! It has made a huge difference in my level of pain and is so easy to use! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Wishbone

customer_reviews.title: Another Busted seam.. another ruined shirt..
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in April 2019. One popped a seam in Feb 2020, the other just now. Gray silica goo everywhere. The blue ones don't seem (seam) to hold up very well. Be careful. Other than that product was nice. Was my favorite cold pack. I might buy a Black one, I most likely will switch brands. one / five don't buy unless you want ruined clothes.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaDanny

customer_reviews.title: Able to easily ice back / shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has a herniated disk in his back and is in a non-surgical treatment plan which seems to be working. Icing is part of the regimen and this product did exactly what it promised. The pack stays cold long enough and is easily manipulated to form around his mid section. He also drapes it over his shoulder when it gets aggravated by too much golf. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lvnative

customer_reviews.title: A must-have ice pack for injuries, chronic pain, and to keep on hand!
customer_reviews.text: These ice packs are great. Physical Therapist recommended: It is the brand of ice pack my mom's physical therapist uses, and my mom liked them so well that she asked for the brand. They are the best ice pack for her shoulder and hip - they wrap around those areas and are big enough and heavy enough to ice thoroughly. My dad also wraps his foot in one at night. Recently, I had a hip and knee injury and bought two sizes for myself, and they are also, hands-down the best ice pack I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I can only give this two stars because it only lasts for a few uses before it starts leaking at the end. It’s filled with a discussing thick tan substance that has ruined a sofa an an expensive quilt before I realized that it was leaking out the end. I thought it was s fluke with the first one I ordered but the same thing happened with this second one. The size is perfect for knee pain if you only want to use it a few times before the leakage starts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LAY/ SIT ON IT
customer_reviews.text: These are not made to support your weight, made of thin material, they will leak if you do. Read the instructions below the description. I missed reading the "Instructions" below. If you want to sit or lay on a cold pack you will have to purchase a heavy duty one instead. Not easy to use on areas such as back or buttocks without some effort to place it on your back side. Other wise OK. They need to post in initial description about not sitting or laying on it. Maybe they are not making that obvious for a reason, over 8K buyers??
customer_reviews.author: horse whisper

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little frustrated after buying this product twice. The first time it lasted approximately 3 years. I use it for my neck, with it lying on a rolled up beach towel for 10 minutes 2 to 3 times a week. First one started leaking, so I bought a second. It lasted only a few months before starting to leak. Past the 30 day return policy, so there's no compensation for me. My physical therapist had recommended it, because it's pliable, but it's very frustrating when it doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan58

customer_reviews.title: Weak seams, split and leaked onto clothing and furniture.
customer_reviews.text: NOT RECOMMENDED. After less than a month of use the seams broke in several areas and the gooey, sticky material inside it leaked onto clothing and furniture. It has poorly sealed seams and even though I tried to repair it, it just split open at another spot. Unless you expect it for a very short time, I do NOT recommend this item. Not even worthy of 1-star rating but couldn't leave a zero-star.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cold
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the size, the flexibility and the way this pack holds the cold. It works great inside a pillowcase to avoid a little bit of the direct cold. Its almost big enough to wrap around my entire ankle, go across my entire back, or spread across one side of my leg. What else is there to say apart from I've gone through a lot of ice packs. Some don't get cold enough and some break very easily, and this one is both durable and cold enough to ice for at least 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: J. HallTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really a great product for pain and Swelling.
customer_reviews.text: My husband just recently had major reconstruction surgery on his shoulder. These worked so well to keep the swelling and helped to numb the shoulder-pain relief. They really are pliable and hold the cold temperatures needed for hours. We ended up buying several after my mom lent me one to try. Highly recommended. Fast shipping and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Cooling
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the universal and neck/shoulder Colpac set and LOVE the flexibility of the product. My husband recently had his knee replaced and the Colpac was an essential cooling option for him to use. When compared to the hard blue ice packs, the Colpac doesn't last as long, however; we were going for flexible cooling product. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Derek

customer_reviews.title: versatile and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have purchased. We both have acute injuries for which ice is our go-to. These packs are versatile and big enough to wrap around an arm or ankle or use straight across a back. They stay cold for about 20 minutes, longer than we need. Our first one did start to leak after four years of steady use, which is why we bought a replacement. That seems a long time for an item like this. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gourmet Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: When I first took it out of the package, I noticed how heavy it was. I went on and placed it in the freezer; when I took it out, it was hard as a board, and all bent because it didn't fit handily in the freezer. There were no instructions as to whether to place it in the microwave oven to thaw it, so I didn't know whether to or not. The size makes it unwieldly. I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: A good thing except....
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this gel pack would get 5 stars. Great seams; no leaks, durable outer covering. The problem is they are HEAVY!! If you have enough neck/ cervical pain to need an ice pack, the weight of these causes much more pain than the cold can alleviate. The weight is PAINFUL. I tried placing this on stacked pillows and leaning against it to avoid the weight on the back of my neck, but because the outer cover is super smooth, and the pack is so heavy, no matter - it slides down and won't stay anywhere that I put it. I really wanted to like this gel pack.
customer_reviews.author: MS Reader

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a total knee replacement recently and applied the ColPac several times each day. It fit comfortably around his knee and maintained cold for a long period of time. It is important to lay the ColPac flatly in the freezer before so that it remains flat. We also put the ColPac in a pillow case before applying it to his knee. The ColPac treatment and PT have helped my husband tremendously and within 3 weeks he was walking without a cane and able to drive. The ColPac is easy to apply and even when frozen molds easily to the knee and any other body part. We heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seals do not hold
customer_reviews.text: I previously rated this product at 5 stars and was happy with it, but since that time I have found that each ice pack I have bought, the seals have broken. I have had these less than 2 months, and they have gotten a lot of use, after ankle surgery, however, I believe these should have lasted longer than 2 months. We have patched them with super glue and duct tape to get through, but unfortunately this has caused me to lower my overall rating. Not a long lasting product.
customer_reviews.author: A leav

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me 2 and a half years until... read on..
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the over sized one in January of 2018. I have had it since then with no issues. It is now July of 2020. I noticed it was starting to look thinner... then I saw the internal goo started leaking out of the seams in 2 different areas but both on the same seam side. I thought it was ice cream that got spilled onto it but I was wrong. It has lasted me this long so I gave it a 5 star but I want you all the be aware that this happens. My guess is that it gets so cold it actually is prone to cracking at the seams. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: nightwolfhilary

customer_reviews.title: Best cold pack ever!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used a ColPac was during physical therapy after surgery to repair my perineal tendon, and graft my Talus bone. I immediately asked the therapist where I could get one. These cool down relatively fast in the freezer and get deep. If you are using RICE or doing 20/20 hot/cold, I recommend purchasing 2. These last just about 20 minutes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Order the black one, if you want a real cold pack.
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist uses the black version and I assumed the blue one would be the same since it's made by the same company. Nope!! The blue one just isn't as cold. I have to put it directly on my skin and then it's only cool for about 8 minutes. I ordered the black one and the texture is different and it's COLDER, much colder. I don't know why but I'll be returning the blue one for the black one.
customer_reviews.author: mels970

customer_reviews.title: Works great but quality isn’t great-broke twice!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this ice pack but it just doesn’t hold up. I have chronic pain from a spinal injury that I acquired during my pregnancy. The size and design of this ice pack is incredibly helpful and the way that it freezes is awesome. However, the quality doesn’t last! I have ordered two now thinking the first time it broke that it was a fluke but the second time I only got 3 uses out of it before it got a small hole that leaked out the sand type stuff. I’m so bummed! I’ll have to look for a new brand with a similar style.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable ice pack I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many ice pack for several surgeries and chronic pain management. This 11 in x 14 in pack is perfect for my shoulder. It covers the whole area. I hate the ones that are small making it necessary to keep the ice pack on forever because you have to keep moving it around to ice the impacted area. Plus it is not hard as a rock. It is flexible gel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Binegar

customer_reviews.title: Best cold pack ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought several of the black ones after I had a total shoulder replacement and bought this one because it was a little longer than my favorite “shape”. My PT place uses these (black version) and I loved it so much the first time I used one there that I ordered an identical one on my phone as soon as I got to my car! A little on the heavy side. Stays soft and super easy to form. Save the zipper bag it comes in to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the neck area
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use specifically for my neck area as I am undergoing chiropractic treatment and none of the large square or rectangles were either long enough or narrow enough to fit around the back of the neck comfortably. This worked quite well and maintained it's coldness for the entire length of time I used it for (20 minutes) and probably could have been used for a different site had I been so inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Berezoski

customer_reviews.title: Good until it exploded
customer_reviews.text: I wish it stayed cold longer, plus I only had it a lil over a month & it popped. The clay on the inside leaked all over my back & my new car seats. I tried to repair it with duct tape but today it busted another hole and I had to toss it. Sure wish for the price it would've been better. I liked the size for my SI joint.
customer_reviews.author: hwattie

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  LARGE.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my lower back. Just the right size to wrap around my knee. I keep it in the freezer so it's always ready whenever I need it. I've had a smaller one for years, but this is better for "industrial" aches and pains. Nothing bad to say about it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maven-at-large

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but may bust!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, its a great reusable cold pack. They use them at my PT facility and I've bought my own. They can get really cold and stay that way for quite awhile. The bigger sizes obviously stay cold much longer. Only complaint is that they can burst. My 7.5x11 got a little too frozen and the corner seam now leaks. You don't want to get the filling on your clothing, so be sure to always use an old pillow case or something.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Reuseable ice pack, "CHATTANOOGA COLPAC"
customer_reviews.text: I got this ice pack for my back. I really love it, it is flexible enough, and large enough to "form fit" my whole back. This ice pack will even wrap around a leg or arm, too..the outer wrap of the pack is made out of a soft canvas type of material. I would recommend this product to anybody that uses ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerold Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful overall..
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described & VERY helpful (wish I had someone to help me use it, though; it's just a bit heavy & a little difficult to 'flatten out' to apply on the area I need, though, I'm currently quite limited in both my cervical & lumbar/sacroliac spine as I just had my 2nd operation on the former & about to have my 2nd one on the latter...replacing a combined 8 discs; still need one on my thoracic area too).
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: Cold Pack Gel Therapy 👍
customer_reviews.text: I had just had a knee replacement and ordered this cold pack because I had some smaller ones but I wanted one big one that would cover and lay on top and sides of my knee at the same time to keep the swelling down and alleviate pain. It was kind of the type they were using in the hospital a gel pack. Plus it last way longer then the smaller ones. The only draw back is it is heavy but I still like it:) I just keep in a cooler on ice and put it in a pillow case when I use. Quality seems well made and I am definitely getting good use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Cin-Lou

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Size that Matters
customer_reviews.text: This reusable cold pack has a cover that is durable and not easy to puncture. I am using this for my broken back and the size covers the entire affected area. It is pliable enough to conform to the contours of my back making it painless on an already sore spine. After use, lie it flat in the freezer and it’s ready to use again in a couple hours. Plus, the price is extremely affordable on any budget. I highly recommend this cold pack to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: TannK

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS EVEN IF ORDERING THE WRONG SIZE AND NOT OPENING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the wrong size and when it was delivered, I realized what I had done, and went to Amazon to get a return authorization and then purchase the correct size. I was met with a NO RETURNS for this item screen. After reading many other comments, I found out this is policy. I understand if something was opened and the possibility the product might have been used and there might be health reasons, BUT, What if you made a simple mistake and want to exchange?????????? Unbelievable and you can bet, I want buy their product again!!!! PS, I had to put down one star on all ratings or you can't submit this form!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Z

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, bulky and sweats a lot. Not practical.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, bulky and sweats all over you. I purchased this large ice pac to use on my pillow/head for bad migraines as i have a small, Walmart brand one and wanted something a little larger. The cheap Walmart one I’ve had for years doesn’t sweat and it lightweight, plus I can move it from forehead to back of head easily and it stays cold for a while. This one isn’t easy to move around for pain and hurts to lay across forehead because it’s so crazy heavy. And I can’t even return it. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore muscles, back pain, and what ails ya!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these - I tried taking some on the plane recently and TSA tossed them. So.. remember that gel pacs evidently are not carry-on items. They are great for all sorts of injuries - sprains, pulls, back pain, burns, and my kids even like them for their boo-boos. They're soft and conform to where you need it and apply cold all around the injury site; remember to use a towel or cloth between the pac and your skin to avoid injury to your skin from the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but lasted 10months
customer_reviews.text: This was great until the seam where it was sealed popped open and the grey/beige gel started to leak out. I tried to keep using it, but when I'd fold it up to put it back in the freezer, more gel would come out and it was a mess. However, when it worked, it was awesome, heavy and huge. Wrapped around my whole knee. I'll need to buy another right now. It lasted 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: BRIE

customer_reviews.title: Great product poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product I have had back surgery and knee surgery and it has helped tremendously. They stay cold they don’t hurt your skin the different sizes are amazing! I have purchased 10 in the last year. They have all burst at the seams which leaves me with the Tennessee clay inside it all over the place. There has to be a better way for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dmmun

customer_reviews.title: There might be a problem
customer_reviews.text: When I took ice bag out of the shipping bag, the accompanying instruction sheet was completely wet. I could not tell though whether the ice bag was leaking anywhere. It might have frozen during shipment and then defrosted once it got here to Arizona!? I'll use it and watch it and if I detect a leak, I'll return it or put duct tape on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: size to large to not have seams to prevent shifting of gel
customer_reviews.text: This product does not get cold enough evenly as Size seems to prevent enough coldness over the entire area to be of use considering size . I purchased for size to use on my entire back , with no seems at all other than perimeter it will not be cold enough in some parts as gel shifts . Would return if returnable which it is not . Don’t purchase this size .
customer_reviews.author: Pat F.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, strong chemical smell from mine
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this product, there was a very strong chemical odor. I’m not sure if it’s the outside material, the packaging, or if it’s leaking or what, but I’m super sensitive to smells, so using it is not an option for me. Instead of helping with my headache, it made it worse. It also says it’s 3#, it feels heavier. I know it’s not, but it’s too bulky to really do anything with (except lay flat) if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Sandsunandsea

customer_reviews.title: Very good cold pack
customer_reviews.text: My wife had knee replacement surgery and needed ice packs to ice down her knee. I went and looked at the local drug stores and theirs were expensive and not very large. I found these on Amazon and I could not believe how inexpensive they were and really nice. They are large, we bought two, one for the top and one for the bottom side of her knee. Perfect! I would highly recommend Chattanooga ColPac - Blue Vinyl - Standard - 11 in x 14 in (28 cm x 36 cm).
customer_reviews.author: Randy H. Desgranges

customer_reviews.title: Gel leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of this gel pack, perfect for use on shoulder or lower back. HOWEVER, I have had two pack and the first one lasted about six months and began to leak the fluid inside - the second one began to leak after four months!!! I am not rough with these packs. I am very careful but I will not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: mhastings

customer_reviews.title: Best Cold Pack
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist use this brand and I had to have the same. I love how cold these packs can get even wrapped in a towel and it lasts for quite a long time. When in need of ice, these packs are premium and feel great where needed. I find them not as expensive as other brands I've seen and every bit worth the money. I am extremely satisfied with this product so much so that I purchased the cold pack for the neck which is quite versatile for other areas other than the neck.
customer_reviews.author: by: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really cold and stays flexible
customer_reviews.text: Really cold and stays flexible. The three stars is because it gets so cold, same as ice. Then the lack of a cover or sock over the plastic water vapor freezes (frost) to it. Making the surface very wet after 15min of use. I will make my own cover out of thin towel cloth to make it tolerable. But it keeps its flexibility, NICE.
customer_reviews.author: J. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Pain management without a pill!
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first Chattanooga ColPac and will not be my last. I usually get 2 to 3 years of rough service out of them before they develope a leak. I think better care as in leaving them flat with no wrinkles while in the freezer may eliminate that problem. Anyway, Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.author: Roll Man

customer_reviews.title: Great, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my back pain. It covers a large area and I can put it across my back for muscle aches or along my spine for nerve pain. It is big ( which I wanted) but challenging to get in the top freezer of refrigerator, in part because it is quite heavy, especially for someone with back problems. It does hold the cold well, maybe an hour. I’ve never timed it. I gave it four stars because I wish it had a cover and maybe some kind of strap. Overall though it does the job well, and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinda

customer_reviews.title: Breaks open, doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The seam broke open and not it cannot be used. There should be some sort of warranty for this. I have had this for less than 6 months. Always laid it flat. Worked really well but is a rip off if it doesn’t last without leaking. I would recommend a better quality product from a better company. I’m very disappointed that I can no longer use this. It worked so well for my low back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Djm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: My husband had shoulder surgery and these came recommended by his physical therapist. I'm so glad we listened and ordered - they are super large, easy to mold, and stay cold forever. We bought two and have used them many times. Very happy with this purchase! I do recommend slipping them in a pillowcase before use when taking them out of the freezer - that will help protect the skin and also absorb any moisture that forms as the pack begins to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for back pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cold pac because it is the brand used at my physical therapist’s office. It is a great size and maintains its cool temperature for a good amount of time, but the one I received has a very strong and unpleasant odor. I’m hoping it fades away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Lilo

customer_reviews.title: works great, but hard to flatten back out
customer_reviews.text: The cold pack works very well and is very cold - went from tea towel to regular towel between skin and cold pack. My only whine is the pack does not flatten back out very well before putting it back in freezer. The "pro" or office version I can flatten back out in my hands on way back to freezer. The light blue version, I have to lay on table and press the gel back into even layer. I know, such an effort! <grin> btw, a Warmth rating on a cold pack? How do I give it zero stars as this cold pack is very cold!
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Ford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gel Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for icing my lower back and tail bone, where I am prone to episodes of muscle and nerve pain. It is a good quality product and provides the best, lasting relief. I highly recommend gel ice packs and this one in particular is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Form-fitting and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a small framed woman and find the neck contour easy to use. It covers my neck and shoulders. You can wrap it in a towel or not. I switch back and forth on that. It also folds (or rolls up) easily to save room in the freezer. The gel gets cold but is still pliable.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya Creates

customer_reviews.title: Not very flexible, cannot be returned even when unopened
customer_reviews.text: This item isn't very flexible to wrap around your knee, Etc. When I received it I realized oh, I already had one like it but smaller that I would not use because it was not flexible enough and very uncomfortable to use when icing my knee. Even though I had not opened the the package, Amazon said it was not eligible for return. I wish when items are ineligible for a return that Amazon would write that in an obvious place underneath the items before you order it. All they would have to do is write, "not available for return," after the item description.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Port Saint Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Reusable Gel Ice Pack
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this cold pack for his back and knee. The seam opened up and spilled gel all over our sofa. He taped it up with duck tape, but it still leaks occasionally. The size is great and it holds the cold, but needs to be better sealed.
customer_reviews.author: GMB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for knees, but...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had both knees replaced, 1 month apart. We found these ice packs and thought it would be great to have 2 large packs , one for each knee. The size is perfect! The only problem is that one ice pack freezes so much, it becomes hard and not pliable as the other. That one we have to keep in the fridge vs the freezer if we want/need to use it. If both were the same, they’d get a 5 star. Because one doesn’t work as it should, they get a 4 star. Great value though.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Rose Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Good for icing swollen knees and back
customer_reviews.text: When my husband had a bad injury, I bought several of these to help reduce the swelling in his lower back and thigh I use them to help reduce the swelling in my knees after I work out and ride my horses. Large enough to wrap around my knee. Sometimes it seems to “ “sweat “ I suppose it’s thawing . Easy to use, gently place in the freezer until needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Life saver in my surgery recovery
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a laparoscopic hysterectomy so I have 3 incisions. 1 in my belly button and one on each side. This neck cooling pack has been a life saver as it covers all 3 of my incisions. It doesn’t stay super cold for to long but I’m only supposed to ice my incisions for about 15 mins at a time anyways. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Really wraps around my hip.
customer_reviews.text: The size of this ice pack is an important feature. I use it to reduce the inflammation from arthritis, and it really works fast. I think it's because of its wrap around ability. The whole hip is surrounded with the cold. Works very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Minault

customer_reviews.title: Do you have sciatic pain? Ice packs and aspirin can help a little bit-take the edge off
customer_reviews.text: This is the best company-they've always stood by their product even when they've split open which can happen. I'm sure it will be easy to make it cheaper but they would surely split open. Chattanooga has always been good to me and I have a lot of experience with ice packs-it's about the only thing besides aspirin that can help with severe sciatic pain
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Pack I’ve used, but it tears and is unsealable
customer_reviews.text: I love these ice packs (I’m on #3), if you sit or put pressure they can tear. We’ve tried fishing water repair patches, bike tire patches, and other glues with no luck. These are better than Elasto-gel (kind often used in PT), koo-care, and bexgen. I have to use them daily, so have strong options about the packs. They mold nicely to the back, legs, neck, feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dera Dud

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 7 Years
customer_reviews.text: I bought another since the previous one lasted 7 years before it began to leak when the side seam failed. I consider 7 years to be pretty good service for a relatively low cost. There is no question that the seam is a point of failure that should be better designed. Most of the negative reviews are due to seam failures. We'll see if this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Not very cold
customer_reviews.text: Not cold enough for cold therapy. The gel is very malleable but there are no straps or Velcro to hold it in place. I'll probably keep wrapping the this one around my shoulder instead Medi-Temp Head-Neck Hot/Cold Therapy Pad
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Fit (Rebecca Cat)

customer_reviews.title: Ruined after after a few months of minimal use - multiple purchases later
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this 3 times in 4 years. The first time was 2016 and it lasted until 2019 when it began leaking at seam. I purchased in Sept 2019 and by Nov 2019 it leaked again again. I purchased in Nov 2019 and tonight it popped a hole and leaked again. Not sure what's happened to the quality of this product but I'm disappointed that it falls apart after a few months. I will be forced to purchase something else now as I don't want to keep wasting money after a few months of very light use.
customer_reviews.author: mjwkjw

customer_reviews.title: Leaky mess
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months of gentle use the bag is leaking from the sides. The gel that leaked out stained my chair. I tried to contact the company but the work involved to find a customer service or contact is starting to become a full time project. I was hoping off talking to a person to remedy the problem instead of leaving a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: ingrid scozzafava

customer_reviews.title: Works great but s not durable. See my comments please.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but the seams split after a month or two of regular use. One used recommended applying duct tape around the outer edges before using pad. Ive done this with the last two we bought and it seems to work. I used gorilla tape which is stronger and stickier. I gave 3 stars because we had to throw out two. Even though the tape seems to work it shouldn’t be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of loaning this to a coworker and never got it back. When my aches and pains flare up this is a great relief. I love how long it stays cold and how cold it stays. Might be helpful for those hot flashes and night sweats, too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Way to heavy and large to be helpful
customer_reviews.text: Heavy!!!! Not good for medical relief. Far too heavy. I bought two for back pain relief. Just picking up the package about broke my back and I’m a farm gal. Incredibly large and I can’t imagine them weighing less when frozen. Package was open and both were soiled. No way could I carry them to return them and so grateful I didn’t have too. Rethink purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L.

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST ice pad!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. I found out about it through my rehab people after my first knee replacement. It stays soft and pliable and is SO convenient to use. I've ordered 4 of these for friends who had medical procedures where they needed to ice after and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold, large size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this ice pack for two months and love it. I’m using it for a back injury and it has helped greatly with discomfort and inflammation. It stays super cold for a really long time. I have fallen asleep on top of it and woken up hours later with it still very cold. It is pretty squishy and soft even when completely frozen. I also love that it is quite large and covers a great portion of my back. Overall a great product and I would recommend it to love ones who need a very large ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knee, bought another for a friend
customer_reviews.text: After my knee surgery, this was invaluable. It kept my knee cold, it wasn't messy or drippy, and was incredibly easy to use during a difficult time. I just bought this again for a friend who had wrist surgery because I found it so helpful. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RK95

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these ice packs for years now and recently needed a third ice pack after a knee replacement. This product did not disappoint!! I’ve had two others for 5 years and they are still working great. I’ve also bought this brand for family members in the past. Everyone I’ve bought them for also lives them. They are easy to store in your freezer and easy to use when you need pain relief. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is nice and cold for pain relief, After LESS THAN 1 MONTH OF OCCASIONAL USE the seam has broken and it’s leaking from a 2” hole. Now it is unusable, AND I’m told by Amazon I can’t return a less than a month old product of what I expected to be a reputable company. Will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Halsnik-Owen

customer_reviews.title: Useful After Knee surgery
customer_reviews.text: My husband had his knee replaced this past week and needed to keep the knee iced for significant periods of time. While these are not made for knees, they worked absolutely wonderful as they would wrap around the knee. The gel worked quickly in the freezer. We bought three but could have survived rotating with just two. Great for the price. Great because they have a dual purpose, back and knee aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. V.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE chemical smell is intolerable
customer_reviews.text: Just received this neck contour cold pack, and upon opening the package, the odor of a horrible chemical smell was terrible. My eyes are now running, my lungs are burning. I am not sensitive to smells or chemicals, so this is really strong to elicit these reactions in me. I wouldn't put this near my body, or smell up the freezer. If it smells that badly, it is probably giving off toxic fumes- not healthy. It is going back today. I don't want it anywhere near me. HORRIBLE- DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Conscientious shopper

customer_reviews.title: I bought four of these. My husband and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. My husband and I both have low back pain and both work on our feet, so at the direction of our physical therapist, we put cold on our low backs first, then followed by heat. They stay cold for about 30 to 40 minutes. They are malleable, so you can also wrap them around an ankle, elbow, shoulder, etc. After use, just flatten them out on the counter and put it back them the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia F.

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold longer then most ice packs
customer_reviews.text: This is like my 5th ice pack from this brand, I’ve bought multiple sizes over the past 3 years. It’s a great ice pack and stays cold for a long time. Only problem I have with it is after time the seams being to pop open and the inside gets everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Head

customer_reviews.title: The Best One Yet!  Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used similar products like this but this one rates the best (in my opinion). It’s heavier, easily conforms to my knee and stays colder longer. I’ve used similar products with straps to make it conform to my knee but no need for straps with this one. The price is very affordable as well. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

product_meta.title: Chattanooga ColPac - Reusable Gel Ice Pack - Blue Vinyl - Standard - 11 in x 14 in (28 cm x 36 cm) - Cold Therapy for Knee, Arm, Elbow, Shoulder, Back for Aches, Swelling, Bruises, Sprains, Inflammation
product_meta.description: Size:11 x 14 InchChattanooga ColPac - Reusable Gel Ice Pack - Blue Vinyl - Standard - 11 in x 14 in (28 cm x 36 cm) - Cold Therapy for Knee, Arm, Elbow, Shoulder, Back for Aches, Swelling, Bruises, Sprains, Inflammation. Do not heat for hot therapy.
feature_bullets: Patented design of the Chattanooga ColPac gently delivers soothing cold therapy and stays pliable during treatment
Provides instant pain relief to treat fever, bruises, sprains, strains, and helps to manage swelling
Each cold therapy pack is latex-free and is filled with non-toxic silica gel, so it's safe for all ages to use
Simply apply immediately after an injury to control the inflammation of soft tissue; Delivers up to 30 minutes of soothing relief
ColPaC is most serviceable when kept in a freezer set at 12° F (-11°C)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
